00029 namespace optimization
00030 {
00031         class Dispatcher : public TaskReader
00032         {
00033                 Glib::RefPtr<Glib::MainLoop> d_main;
00034                 jessevdk::os::FileDescriptor d_stdin;
00035 
00036                 public:
00037                         /* Public functions */
00038                         virtual bool Run();
00039                         virtual void Stop();
00040                 protected:
00041                         virtual bool WriteResponse(messages::task::Response const &response);
00042 
00043                         virtual bool RunTask() = 0;
00044                         virtual bool UseMainLoop() const;
00045 
00046                         Glib::RefPtr<Glib::MainLoop> Main();
00047                 private:
00048                         /* Private functions */
00049                         void OnData(jessevdk::os::FileDescriptor::DataArgs &args);
00050         };
